steps.intro: Welcome to the new Knowledgebase Solution experience. This short tour will highlight some of the new features.

Knowledgebase Solutions are now mobile-friendly, making them easy to view on all your devices. We've also relocated elements from the right sidebar to allow the main content to fill more of your screen.
No matter where you are on the page, you can comment, rate, or follow using the buttons on the left.
Now you can let us know if content is helpful to you. You and the community benefit by helping us improve content.
Comments have an updated look and feel and are now optimized for mobile.
Thanks for taking the tour. Have feedback? Tell us about it here.
